extendedInfo.description: So whenever I travel - one of the most important thing while selecting a hotel (apart from hotel costs) are facilities available near by. Some people (hotel staff's perception of nearby - might be awfully wrong). :PSo after that BAD experience (where everything was NEARBY - as per hotel staff - i didn't have the time to search on the web). I decided to work on this idea and come up with a simple application - which you can carry in your tab or phone - to give you exact details of what you have near-by your hotel (with-in 15-20 minutes of walking radius).So Whats Near My Hotel Singapore - is the first in the series of such applications. Some facts about this application:- 162 top Singapore Hotels- Three classes of hotels: Luxury, Mid-range, Budget- Ability to filter hotels by class- Ability to Bookmark Hotels- Over 9000 Nearby places for 162 Hotels- On the average of 55 nearby places per hotel (Numerical Computation - No guarantee that there will be 55 near by places per hotel).- Types of near by places include: food, restaurants, ATM, banks, bars and so on- Results for nearby are cached- Ability to add Bookmarks- Integration with Google MapDisclaimer:- Hotel Prices are just ball-park figures- Check Availability for Hotel Button would open partner Advertiser's website on your browser. You will be subjected to the Privacy Policy of our Advertiser.- Application is ad-supported.- Application is tested mostly using HTC One, Google Nexus 7 Tab, Samsung S4.- Please leave constructive comments- For feature requests please use: contact@datravelapp.com- Our website: http://datravelapp.com
